overview.title: Our good work goes beyond perfect editss
overview.description: We're a team of passionate photo editors dedicated to delivering high-quality image editing services. Our expertise spans across various industries, helping businesses showcase their products in the best light possible.s
overview.mission: we want to deliver good services

main.subtitle: about uss
main.title: Edit your photo in seconds with photodits
main.description: Image editing services for ecommerce businesses and pros, from product photographers to Amazon sellers to global brands.s
main.additionalText: Because a quick product shoot can easily turn into a week or more of editing and formatting your images. Let us look after the edits, so you can get back to the work that needs you.s

team.subtitle: expert team
team.title: Meet the awesome team
team.description: Our team of skilled professionals is dedicated to delivering exceptional results for every project.

questions.question: What is clipping path service?ss
questions.answer: Clipping path is a photo editing technique that involves creating a closed vector path or shape to remove the background from an image. It's commonly used in product photography, e-commerce, and catalog production to isolate objects from their backgrounds.ssss

questions.question: How long does it take to complete an order?
questions.answer: Our standard turnaround time is 24-48 hours, depending on the complexity and volume of images. We also offer rush services for urgent projects that can be completed in as little as 6 hours.

questions.question: What file formats do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept most common image formats including JPEG, PNG, TIFF, PSD, and RAW files. For best results, we recommend providing high-resolution images in their original format.

questions.question: How do I place an order?
questions.answer: You can place an order by filling out our quote form or contacting us directly via email. Once we understand your requirements, we'll provide a quote and timeline for completion.

questions.question: Do you offer bulk discounts?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer volume-based discounts for bulk orders. The more images you need edited, the lower the per-image price will be. Contact us for a custom quote.

cta.title: Ready to transform your images?s
cta.description: Get started with our professional photo editing services today.
